Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute near Homan/Congress
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan  buses temp. rerouted NB: Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan; SB Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan: near Homan/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Homan/Congress, due to fire department activity near Homan/Congress.

Northbound  buses will operate via Homan, Harrison, Kedzie, Jackson and Homan including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Homan, Jackson, Central Park, Harrison and Homan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Sedgwick due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Sedgwick due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses are requested between Kimball and Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may Include:

#81 Lawrence

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
